about_the_game:
When Night Comes is a heart-pumping survival horror game that will have you on the edge of your seat. The game is set in a dark and terrifying atmosphere, where the only goal is to survive your dreams and avoid being claimed by the demonic force known as the Entity.

The Entity invades your nightmares, preying on your fears and vulnerabilities to claim your soul. The stakes are high, and every decision you make can mean the difference between life and death.

As you navigate through the haunting landscape, you must use all of your wit and cunning to evade the Entity's grasp. Every step you take brings you closer to either salvation or doom.

With stunning graphics and bone-chilling sound effects, When Night Comes delivers a truly immersive horror experience. Do you have what it takes to survive the Entity's grasp? Play now and find out!

Credits:
Artwork: Calixte Walls
Music: Vivek Abhishek
Voice Acting: David Piper
Narrative Design: Vera Burd
QA Tester: Dakota Chapman

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, Killing, and Demons, Partial Mannequin Nudity
